author: USA TODAY, Jeanine Santucci, USA TODAY
title: How several states hunkered down the same day Trump promoted going back to normal
description: Trump on Monday signaled he wants to ease White House guidelines on social distancing to help the economy, but states are ramping up restrictions.
content:
President Donald Trump looked to reassure the public Monday that the coronavirus outbreak will be short-lived. Trump said he doesn't want businesses to be shut down for months and that American will "soon be open for business." (March 23)
AP Domestic
